name: Mark My Words
short_description:
Mark My Words is a markdown document processor for creating (web) documents.

Main features:

LIVE PREVIEW

Every time you make a change to your document, Live Preview will show exactely how your document looks. You can change the look of Live Preview using custom themes.

HTML EXPORTING

You can export your document in two different formats. One including the selected theme, one without any styling. The last one you can also directly copy from the editor.

SHORTCUTS

For everything you can do in Mark My Words there is a shortcut. Knowing and using these shortcuts will make working on your documents a lot easier and more efficient.

ZEN

Mark My Words has a very minimalistic design so you won't be distracted while writing.

SNIPPETS

You can save snippets of text in the snippets folder so can easily insert them using Ctrl + Tab.

IT'S 100% FREE
summary: Mark My Words is a markdown document processor.
